caption: Road Map
title: Bonus
paragraph1: Volume bonus during the whole campaign:
list2Item1: 20% discount, if accumulated sum since ICO launch does not exceed $3 mn
list2Item2: 15% discount, if accumulated sum since ICO launch does not exceed $10 mn
list2Item3: 10% discount, if accumulated sum since ICO launch does not exceed $20 mn
list2Item4: 5% discount, if accumulated sum since ICO launch does not exceed $30 mn
